controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController
    Controller is the class that transfer the informations from the view to the model

    The Controller needs some informations to know how the game elements are :

    • An Element table to place the objects
    • The objects of the Demons and there locations
    • Lorann and his locations
    • A score used in the view to show the progression
    • The state of the door that changes in the game
    • The movements of the Spell and its uses

    For all of that, the Controller needs also the instructions given by the player that can be RIGHT, LEFT, UP, DOWN, NOMOVE, SPACE.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Running game method.

        This method is in function while the game is turned on. It sends informations to the view to display the good sprites of the objects in function of their positions. It also manages to end the game if the player lose or win.

        Specified by:
        play in interface IController

      • ifWin

        public void ifWin()
        Win condition method. This method says when the player can win the game by going on the Door.
        Specified by:
        ifWin in interface IController

      • ifDead

        public void ifDead()
        Loose condition method. This method says when the player loose the game by getting killed by the enemies.
        Specified by:
        ifDead in interface IController

      • IA

        public void IA()
        The method of how the enemies work. The Demons move randomly in 5 choice of movements : RIGHT, DOWN, LEFT, UP, NOMOVE.
        Specified by:
        IA in interface IController

      • movement

        public void movement()
        Method of how the moves work. The movement of the characters is defined here in function of the UserOrder.
        Specified by:
        movement in interface IController

      • throwSpell

        public void throwSpell()
        This method create the spell and launch it. The direction of the spell is chosen with the actual direction of lorann at launch in the moveSpell method.
        Specified by:
        throwSpell in interface IController
        See Also:
        moveSpell().

      • moveSpell

        public void moveSpell()
        moveSpell is a method that make the spell move in the direction of the player's character. The sprite of the spell change randomly between 5 different to have an effect of blinking of the object. In function of the direction at start, the spell go straight in this way and when the spell can't continue in the same line, it move in the opposite way.
        Specified by:
        moveSpell in interface IController
